values:
well,its been a long while since i have dedicated myself to this.things have been pretty hectic with school,and work and the fact that i have a social life now.the title is fitting because sean's official last day at work is today and we are getting drunk friday nite.hes my boss,but i really dont care this time.key points:
NIN was awesome.anthony and i had an excellent time,considering we got lost for about 30 minutes.school is going ok.there is this one class that i always end up skipping,yet im doing fairly well.i dont ever talk to rob since that nite last week where he asked me to have sex with him the next day because he and his girlfriend were on the outs.i have had this massive crush on the guy up the street for a long time and we have been talking since mayso we finally hung out the other nite and he was the sweetest piece of man ive ever seen.my getting home at 4 am this morning can be attributed to the new gentleman that  i work with.ive always found him attractive but just recently told him.he waited until i got off of work and then we drove around in the city,went to a sex shop and parked the car.i told him i liked him and we were kind of holding hands and we ended up kissing for about 20 mins,which is nice because ive never had anyone be that nice before.BAHHHHHH.and hes black,nukkas.that is all for now .....i may have earth shattering news soon.depends..





a bun in the oven?

ah,anyway,im in the throes about not going to college at a university,and im having money issues.spending more than i have can get you in a bit of trouble.ive also gotten charge cards for jewelery stores so for christmas,everyone is getting bling.hmm...im off of work all this week and i have taken it upon myself to do pretty much nothing.ive done my nails,exfoliated,been on a date,gotten some sweet love....honestly,..it had been a long time and i really wasnt looking forward to yet another date bombing.but it didnt.we had so much fun and a good conversation...we went to watch a movie at his house and also had time to impress me with the experience his years had given him.i like him.hes smart and confident and NOT ROB.so hopefully,we'll see eachother soon.everything was going fine until this stupid jackass from my past decided to chime in :

cwgibson13: well maybe i will let u do bad things to me cuz u stole my heart when i met u
djnippy12: i did not
cwgibson13: yes u did , then u went back to your x
djnippy12: well...i mean...something more than sex is what i wanted and you had a lot of potential and i didnt know why you didnt just see that
cwgibson13: see what that u like me?
djnippy12: mm...kinda ..but that just wanting to be with one person is not a bad thing
cwgibson13: do u think of me?
djnippy12: yes
cwgibson13: i miss talking to u 
djnippy12: do you think about me?
cwgibson13: yes and i love that big ass
djnippy12: haha
djnippy12: thanks
djnippy12: i told you i was amazing.lol
cwgibson13: can i still try?
djnippy12: if things with him dont get real serious,but i dont want just sex.you know that
cwgibson13: i know but get serios with him and let me taste what i missed
cwgibson13: please
djnippy12: why would you want to?
cwgibson13: cuz i like the pain that it bring knowing that i had a good thing and i fucked it up
cwgibson13: i like self destruction
djnippy12: how come you never told me anything like this
cwgibson13: do u want me inside of u
cwgibson13:i would do u so good, and treat u so right for that hr or 2 and then it would just be friend agian

                   NEXT ENTRY:
How do you propostion a man who already wants to bang your lights out,about a threesome with another man?

im watching dr. phil...and i cried when they gave houses to the victims of katrina.and im thinking 'why cant we all just see eachother as people?' FUCK RACISM.you have to be a really low person to judge someone on the pigment of their skin as opposed to their thoughts,wants and needs.and you know?..it really upsets me the apathy that we still face today.how i am surrounded by ignorance everywhere.i can honestly say that i put in a conservative effort to accept everyone.some people are just lazy and do not want to do that,but its ok,something really bad will happen to you one day and i probably wont care.

many things to say,so little time.lets make some key points:

1.i have yet to make any friends at school yet
2.who has heard of mr.sigler's new girlfriend?yes,thats right,there is yet another woman(or girl if im corect in her identity) that is attracted to rob
3.george bush,does indeed hate black people,if kanye west said it,it must be true
4.i have a little crush on someone.actually,not even a little one.i have a huge crush on the most wonderful person ever.

now,college is not hard if you keep in mind that its only until december and i was relieved today to learn that my psych 103 only has 4 exams and the rest of the class is a lecture.i have the sweetest piece of man in that class.of course he looks about 33,but hey,thats fair game to me.
who could care less about rob anymore? apathy can only continue for so long until the real world crashes right into you.he will learn this eventually.and i am finally,dare i say it,out of love.sure theres still memories that send my brain back into love,but those are only images,not the real thing.i have wrestled with the idea of moving on but it was not until in a drunken state yesterday that i found out he in fact was dating someone.even though he "wasnt ready for a relationship" 3 months ago,he is happily involved.
thirdly,if this hurricane doesnt make people see that the federal government is a waste of time,i think they should be shot in the head.we can airdrop food after the tsunami,but not to our own people? now,i have nothing against giving to other countries,but there is some kind of incongruence here.it couldnt have happened at a worse place.as if we already didnt deal with racism,now people will be fighting even longer:black people loot,while white people find food? please.as a caucasian human being,i feel the need to constantly apologize for the conduct exhibited by other caucasians.i am deeply sorry for the unethical treatment placed upon african americans at this time or any other.but in a semi-hypocritical statement,i did see a good number of whites in the images too.
to sum it up.........someone makes me truly happy

punk rock is officially dead.i killed it

you know.school starts soon.im excited to learn,not excited to assimilate.i dont think i make friends very easily.i mean,im fun to be around,once you know me,but am i a good friend maker? i havent made friends in so long,i think  i have forgotten.the dating scene is crashing and burning,go figure.all except for two sweet ass men.but we will keep that exposed.the alpha male i slept with last month while rob was camping,has been bragging about all the girls he has bedded.shocker.well,we were all disgusted,especially after he was not bad sex at all.i was rolling around in my mind when it occurred that karma was going to fuck him up.and sure enough *snaps fingers*, tha bitch got 2 inches sliced into his leg.i knew there was some omniscient being looking out for me,well,besides anthony markley.also,another topic.check this out,all attractive people are not whores.do you people not get that? i mean,i get about 9540506 IMs a day for just dumb shit and i shouldnt have to justify myself but i do:

CopenHagen315: no its called satisying ur human needs and some people need it so they dont kill themselves
CopenHagen315: im not tryin to sound stupid or immature either
djnippy12: if anyone needs to have sex to keep from killing themselves,i suggest they get a hobby
CopenHagen315: ha ha 
djnippy12: all im saying is emotional makes the physicality better
CopenHagen315: i think ur thinkin about this too hypothetically
CopenHagen315: have u ever had a good relationship w/ out sex
djnippy12: yes
CopenHagen315: 4 how long
CopenHagen315: im tryin to prove a point
djnippy12: a year and then he proposed to me
CopenHagen315: wow
CopenHagen315: whoa
CopenHagen315: mind me asking but what happened
djnippy12: he had to go away to cali and i..met someone else
CopenHagen315: wait u were engaged and u cheated on him
djnippy12: i said i met someone else.i waited until we were broken up to pursue this other person
CopenHagen315: ur really about upholding values arent u 
djnippy12: i try.couldnt tell from the picture,could you?
CopenHagen315: no u should change it, it really does give the wrong impression
djnippy12: well,then i guess i put the impression to shame.im not stuck up or a prude or anything.i like sex and all its forms,actually,more than a lot of people,but not just with anyone
CopenHagen315: well thats what that sites all about meeting people in general not just sex and even though were talkin about thats really not what im about
CopenHagen315: but i do like it a lot
CopenHagen315: ur in a realtionship right now?
djnippy12: no
CopenHagen315: oh 
CopenHagen315: dont u miss sex though
djnippy12: ive had it after the relationship,and i miss it,but im a good masturbator
djnippy12: lol
CopenHagen315: well c wouldnt u prefer a real cock
djnippy12: yes,but that doesnt mean im desparate for it

WHAT THE FUCK MAN? IS EVERYONE ADOPTING THE MR.SIGLER WORKOUT PLAN?

so lets get down to business,shall we? work-we are now running like clockwork.we have gotten everyone trained so that the store can run successfully at night without myself or gerard lang.weve really got a good thing going here and i am very content with the crew..the managers,not so much.theres a lot of shady things going on,a lot of back talking/stabbing.i mean,these people are 30/40 years old and cant stand confrontation.anyway,rob is still on his "i dont want a relationship" kick,which leaves me some spare time to build on my sexual empowerment phase.and by sexual empowerment,it isnt all about sex,its confidence.i have been meeting quite a few men that i like and feeling very good about myself.i started reading 'how to win friends and influence people',which i like.
what is there to say?....im going to be living with mother fuckin anthony markley......im still at work.....and i still love rob til my heart bleeds.peace out muh fuckers

you ever get the feeling that someone is going to ask you out...and you can feel that its going to happen and you just want to yell to them, "come on already!". jesus.yes,proclaim your love via instant messenger.so i pose this question,like every other time i write in this is,should you move on? should we all just start over when we clearly have unfinished business?i mean,is it detrimental to bring a new person into a relationship that is not and probably never will be over?is it already cheating if you date someone,but are still in love with someone else?

LegendofMetal777: i think we could have something here 
djnippy12: i think so too

my scanner is really giving me a time.the first body shots that i want to put online of me and rob from prom,and it doesnt want to work.oo it will work.this week has been driven solely by greed.in every aspect of my life.ive been working and trying to go without breaks to make more money,now that i am actually paying taxes,i have to compensate for profit lost.sean has a couple deals in the works and once we rip these people off,we're looking at about $800.ive been trying to wrack my brain thinking about what i will spend that on.probably buy a new phone and go to the ocean again.but as for the social scene,i went on my first date in a long time the other day and i absolutely loved it.it was proof that gentleman do exist.no matter how many men i talk to or become interested in,i always end up wanting rob.i cant stay away from him because he was the first person i actually fell in love with and stayed in love with.it will take one hell of a man to keep me away from him.we didnt speak for 2 weeks,then i saw him ...and kissed him and it was like things should be normal again but he just doesnt want it.i need stability,but if it means losing him,i dont want it.i will take an unsure future.

well,things have been returning to a homeostasis since i have been home. i havent been as lazy and am trying to show my parents that i am just an ungrateful brat and i do appreciate what they do for me.my guy situation is i suppose so so.i have been trying to keep up in phone tag with craig up the street because he always calls me,gets the voicemail and when i drive by,hes never home.he has expressed great interest though and i would oblige all of his advances.it would be nice to not have to go through all of this and secure myself with a relationship,but that doesnt look like it is happening.i am going out with will on tuesday which i am very excited about.this is the first guy in a long time that is actually out of my league but things ended up pretty ok.he is a nice guy.i put some money away for books for the fall so my parents arent paying for everything.and tomorrow starts A 42 HOUR WORK WEEK.sweet jesus.i am not going to make it.......

well,i am writing this in a state of incoherence.this whole month has just been foreplay leading up to senior week,which for rob and myself, ended yesterday.last week,we spent most of the time,shopping for food and whatnot, trying to make our accomodation more enjoyable and the day we were supposed to leave,we were pretty much set to go. we followed dan,esa,cliff and rose down to OC and i got the feeling that we were not going to be able to stay with them,so rob andf i took the money we were supposed to give to them as rent and booked a motel room which covered us for every night after that.when we got back to their place,they told us there wasnt enough room,so we left their stuff in the parking lot and found motel #2.this one was nice and on the boardwalk.we got a little blazed,took a nap,woke up,drank and went out.this cycle continued from saturday to about tuesday.tuesday night,after kicking his ass in bowling and mini golf,we went to party with gerard.we drove them home and prepared for check out time and the adventure of finding another room.we found this piece of shit hole in the wall for $64 and we took it.this room was literally the size of my room,with a shower and no bathtub.i found it quite unnerving that there was always a constant flow of people outside of our window,but it didnt matter.that day/night,we had the best sex ever.and when i say sex,i mean, "oh my god i was so high i dont remember doing that" sex,which is not usual for me.it was just so good.i didnt even think i could move like that.i even got on top ;).thursday as we left OC,we got a flat tire,had to change it,put air in the spare and i had to hit bec up for some money because we had none for gas.we hit every traffic jam known to man.rob slept.he held my hand.i love my little puppy bramel

Daniel and Jasmine are sitting alone in the park one night....

Daniel: I guess we are the left overs in this world

Jasmine: I think so... All of my friends have boyfriends and we are only the 2 persons left in this world without any special person in our lives

Daniel: Yup I don't know what to do

Jasmine: I know! We'll play a game

Daniel: What game?

Jasmine: i'll be your girl friend for 30 days and you will be my boy friend

Daniel: That's a great plan in fact i don't anything to do for the following weeks...

DAY 1:

They watch their first movie and they both touched in a romantic film

DAY 4:

They went to the beach and have a picnic...Daniel and Jasmine have their quality time together

DAY 12:

Daniel invited Jasmine to a circus and they ride on a Horror House....Jasmine was scared and she touched Daniel's hand but she touched someone else's hand and they both laughed...

DAY 15:

They saw a fortune teller down the road and they asked for their future advice and the fortune teller said: "My darling, Please don't waste the time of your life... SPend the rest of your time together happily" Then tears flow out from the teller's eyes

DAY 20:

Jasmine invited Daniel to go to the hill and they saw a meteor...Jasmine mumbled something

DAY 28:

They sat on the bus and because of a bumby road Jasmine gave her first kiss to Daniel by accident

DAY 29:

11:37pm

Jasmine and Daniel sat in the park where they first decided to play this game...

Daniel: I'm tired Jasmine...Do you want any drinks? I'll buy you one.. I'll just go down the road

Jasmine: Apple Juice that's all

Daniel: Wait for me....

20mins later... a stranger approached Jasmine

Stranger: Are you a friend of Daniel?

Jasmine: Why yes? What happened?

Stranger: A reckless drunken driver ran over Daniel and he is critical in the hospital

11:57pm

The doctor went out of the emergency room and he handed out an apple juice and a letter

Doctor: We found this in daniel's pocket

Jasmine reads the letter and it says:

Jasmine, This past few days, i realized you are a really cute girl and i am really falling for you..Your cherish smile your everything when we played this game..... Before this game would end...I wouldlike you to be my girl friend for the rest of my life.... I love you Jasmine....

Jasmine crumples the paper and shouted:

"Daniel ! i don't want you to die... I love you...Remember that night when we saw a meteor, I mumbled something... I mumbled that I wish we would be together forever and never end this game. Please don't leave me Daniel.... I love you! You cannot do this to me!"

Then the clock strikes 12

Daniel's heart stop pumping

THEN IT WAS THE 30TH DAY........

*************************************************

If you were given a time to bestow petals of everlasting compassion and love to your loved ones? Today is the day.... Love them while they are still here...

Copy Paste and after 24hours .... Your loved one will realize how they are significant to you!

I
love
you
and
Need
you
Forever
<3


Repost this in 5min.
and a miracle will happen tonight

Do not ignore or youll regret it late

well,today,05-05-05, started out fairly well. i awoke refreshed and full of diet pepsi because  i kept getting up and drinking it. i went past school to see how many cars were not in the parking lot.bahaha.then i went  othe bank and waited in that godawful line forever to withdrawl $20 for the task at hand.i put 5 of it in my tank and headed for the mr. goemmers.when i got there he was mowing the lawn so i cleaned out my car and went and got iced tea from his work.esa,rose,clff and bec all came down then we traveled along route 1 behind a trolley on a trailer for q0 minutes,then we got onto 24 where we came across a waffle house.sweet,precious and o so thin waffles.and the best mother fuckin hasbrowns you could ask for.i wanted pie.bad.then we went to record and tape traders and dan bought 'with teeth'.i returned home,no call from school and parents still unaware.i have one more absence to use up and then 05, we out.

i wonder if mom knows that im running a porn ring in her basement? or if she would freak out if she knew that at any given time,she could find atleast 20 pics of her daughter in uncompromising situations on a google search and in the mailboxes of frat boys,goth boys,business men,dropouts..etc...
eh whatever.i got kicked out of work todayfor arguing with sean again.a fucking primate could run that store better than he could.i miss rob still....

well,after driving everyone to the hospital on monday,i had a dinner with rob and everything was going fine until jeff called.ah,the call from the other man.well,rob got angry ,as he should,we got into a fight and he said i used inappropriate tone with him,so,he dumped me.i miss him but nothing has really changed.as time has shown,we still hang out and he is still my prom date. both of us, as a collective and separates, cannot be without eachother and i am now understanding why.it doesnt matter to me and i have hit the lowest of low.sean veasley always says never let them see you sweat,well you know what,tonite im sweating and crying.everyone can see it and i dont want anyone to look away.

LeperAffinityX: rob is a...
djnippy12: beetle?
LeperAffinityX: pomegranite
LeperAffinityX: he looks very ordinary on the outside
LeperAffinityX: but if you slice him in half, there are many juicy seeds, but the pulp itself is extremely bitter

so you know what,hate is just not worth it.this may have been hypothetical,it may have not been but as i thought about things while i looked at the stars today i realized that no one has time to spend their life disliking other people.so as of now,i have dedicated myself to giving everyone a chance and being responsible for my actions and not directing words at undeserving people just because i am having a bad day.so i apologize with not only sincerity but maturity in hopes that my evoling character will once again prevail.

I AM SORRY.we had a brief meeting today and what i thought would give me enjoyment,really just sickened me.you are smart enough to figure sincerity out and you have proved this time and time again,i hope that you will see it this time.

i have been wracking my brain for the last week trying to organize my thoughts into words and finally i have come up with this: when does destiny stop? i mean,if you were destined to meet someone and they changed your life forever,can they be omitted from your life forever, or are the circumstances there so that you prevail and find them?
when does a former soulmate become "former"? or can they ever? 
         tim...i sit alone at night sometimes and i wonder where you are,who youre with and are you as happy as i am? you still play a part in my life as the first person  i ever truly loved but not the love of my life.there is a man 2.5 miles away from me who loves me just the way you did,for all the reasons you did, and loved those same things about me, only he saw me inside as well.you are an amazing person and although these words will never get to you, hopefully fate brings you to me for closure.i dont know why i need to see you, but i do.it will put my life into perspective and end that chapter.my fidelity for rob stands strong, but my burning curiousity screams at me to turn the page and close the book.....i need you.i dont know for what and why,of how you will comfort me,all i know is that you will.

ah yes. so my week is still in suck mode.ive been searching for redmeption at every corner and coming up short.ive never thought of myself as a materialistic person,but the things i suppose i have taken for granted are now temporarily at a standstill. since the accident,i have actually been devising a plan to pay back my bills which include taxes,a deductible for the car and a cell phone bill i still owe my mom.she is still using my car so i am left bumming rides off of everyone ,which is ironice because i used to drive everyone and now i am sometimes so desparate for a ride. I asked Anna Mayr why god lets this happen to me and she claims it is just a test.well,ive never really been one for god but there needs to be some kind of external locus. rob is the only one i have and that i know anymore,he is still there.even my friends arent.fairweather friends who come and go as they please.hopefully the relatives will shell out enough money for graduation,or i will win the senior class presentation and pocket $1000. i watched a movie based on the life of ed gein yesterday and was so disappointed.there was no gore,no necrophilia, not even the shots of bludgeoning.i came for the death and destruction,not a plot line.whatever.

You're Bettie Page!

What Classic Pin-Up Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla

yes,this is another entry on how i rock so mother effing hardcore.first,yes,i already informed everyone of the creepers, but now,lets talk taxes.i DO NOT pay taxes. a year and 4 months ago, i decided that i wanted my money,so i filed EXEMPT motherfuckers. for all of you who are tax illiterate or just stupid,basically,where it says on your checks that the federal and state govt. has taken money out of your paycheck,yeah well,i had that blocked.it has caught up with me.i have been foiled.instead of the $5000 i thought i would make in a year so i could LEGALLY file exempt,i made $7041.i owe $300 to the FED bitches by April 2nd.i suppose i will sell myself,or rob for that matter, to be able to front the money. but admit it,i was living gangSTAR.my parents were not happy at all,but its whatev,nah-mean? and the creepers...

well,things have continued in a steady downward spiral(lol),for awhile now,all except for my creepers. for everyone who is not informed of what a creeper is,it is a platform grinder, a shoe ,you dumbass. theyre made in the UK so they have to be good.mine will be black and white and only cost $42, where robs cost a measly $189.we decided against matching shoes because i read somewhere that couples who are too much alike tend to get bored with eachother and as the teen people magazine which i live by states, mr.sigler and myself and mirror images.but we do have our differences: i hate punk RAWK,i shower, pride myself in hygiene,function with a normal sex drive, have a wardrobe of more than 4 t-shirts and when my pet needs to be fed, i satisfy it with nourishment,unlike some people. i have also come up with the battle between intelligence and laziness. my AP  exam for english language,which i have spent a grueling year just staying awake in english for,happens to fall upon senior skip day.thats right kids 05-05-05.so,the dissonance lies here: wake up at 6:50 am,take a 3 hour test sans snacks but with free orange juice, or lay in bed,on my ass(which is proven to burn .2 calories for every pound you weigh)until about 11:37 am and have a day with,as i predict my male counterpart.every essential muscle in my body hurts now that he is done with me.i slumped around in school today and later ate some msg free orange flavored chicken with bec (ms.henshaw).got some good tests courtesy of the GyN the other day and i am disease free,go figure.
off of our break and going well.never been happier...or lazier in terms of school...i love that man

ah yes.havent updated this thing in a hot second.i dont feel like ive disclosed enough of my personal life to everyone so here goes it: rob and i are on a break,which means i am thrown into the dating scene again (somewhat scary) .i have met a really nice nice guy who has the same motives as i do.i like him.hes a good kid.

I won't stop following you
now help me pray for
the death of everything new
then we'll fly farther

for valentines day..copy it and die bitches.some people have a tendency to want to be me,and act like me and talk like me.....proceed

As I sat in my english class today,watching people convey their love through various art products, I realized that I miss you. Even the minutes I am away from you feel like long, monotonous hours filled with disorganization and weariness.I've built my world around you and I wouldn't want it any other way. I didn't think it was at all possible to love someone this much and love every aspect of them: their smile,their stance,their lexicon and their demeanor. But I also appreciate the beautiful things about you: those eyes that I could stare into forever, the hand that fits perfectly into mine and those arms that have held me for every bad day I have had.You are the man I love but also my best friend. I have experienced so many adventures with you by my side and they seemed more beautiful because I was next to you.The tiffs we have are few and far between and although disagreements are thought of as learning tools, I never wish to use them. To be emotionally distant from you is what I strive to be farthest from. There are not enough hours in the day to tell you how much I love you and there is neither enough time to show you. 
I slipped and I fell into love with the most wonderful person I could ever meet. This person is not judgemental, nor does he care about the negative thoughts of others.He has wiped my tears when I have been distraught and held my hand as I was scared. The best thing I have learned from him is how to appreciate myself.Before this, I had always thought of myself as undeserving of such a love and I figured I could never attain such elation, but then I found a best friend. The day I met him was the best day of my life. And every day with him since had been the catalyst for my happiness.I wish I could share this joy with everyone around me and sometimes I am so happy that I wish I could tell the world of a love so pure and uncomplicated. This is all of my hard work paying off. At first, you were unattainable and we both had pur external locusts to deal with , but we united together one day in this unspoken understanding that we as people, somehow belonged together.I felt as if I had so much to give that had remained dormant for so long and now, you acted as my outlet: my wonderful asylum from the travesties of the world. We have something above all those sublunary lovers who only occupy themselves with petty quarrels. The best time spent with you is the time in which nothing is said. I have spent many quiet nights driving through amber lights, watching you as you sleep. That is the best feeling.By far the best thing I have ever acquired. Infatuation is a trinket but true love is a gift.This is the best thing you have ever given me.
I love you so much that my life seems so easy when I imagine it with you.Just the sound of your voice sends that tingle through my veins, almost stopping my heart and leaving me incapacitated by this intrigue.Your beauty can best be described as what makes the world perfect. If everyone woke up in love, there would be no more discontent with life;there would be no more jealousy,envy or hate because what we are feeling leaves us with this state of actualization which leaves us paralyzed from feeling any pain.At first it was just a dream that seemed so unattainable on a whim but now that I have it, I devote all of my time to maintaining this perfection we embody. I LOVE MY MAR MAR......

i was so sad at everything,pissed off at nothing.sat and read for awhile and decided to write.turned on some eighteen visions followed by lamb of god but it didnt seem to calm me.took a shower and then a gradual bath.decided that meds would do the trick so i hopped up on the leftover oxy and tried to tire myself out by performing various...activities.it was not bad.i did not disappoint myself and if not for my bad mood,i would have left my night at that.but i wasnt satisfied.i sat down to write and managed to scrawl out 2 pages of a really good poem which was,of course,tim-inspired.whatev.i guess whatever attempts at sedation i had tried,failed because i ended up being upset and throwing a fit by myself.i called rob and of course,he didnt pick it up.he called me back but we didnt talk.how hard is it to pick up a phone?....around 10:40 i suppose,i got angry and sad and full of what i precieve now as lust and became bored with myself.i remember going into the bathroom and noticing both my parents on the couch.after sitting down,i remember seeing the razor sitting in the shower,just there.i picked it up and ran it against my skin.not hard,or what i thought was not hard,i went back to bed crying and half asleep called rob again and threw the phone after no answer.i woke up this morning and didnt even bother doing my hair and i noticed the cuts on my wrist.felt stupid,ashamed and EMO but then again,i dont really remember it so its not my fault.ive been stumbling around the whole day in a trance of sorts i suppose.finished reading the rules of attraction.it blew my mind.and i also talked sex with the class whore today and i believe,gained not only her respect but bragging rights.today was one of those days i want to curl up in my bathtub and die.........ive been doing all of my homework lately.

so today sucked again.i napped.thats was about it.i went to school,came home and took a nap nap nappy.nothing exciting ever happens during the week.i uploaded trent reznor as my default picture and a picture of myself will follow.instead of bitching about my love life,or lack there of,lets complain about something else: today i almost was jumped by 1/2 the female population in my law class after responding to a prompt with an anti-feminist stance.i know i am in no way incorrect when i say that any rights movement has failed in the past and womens rights is just another attempt.the civil rights movement,was a great idea,it had so much potential,but racism still exists and not even traditional racism, hate derived from a backlash of the movement.womens rights,same thing.social darwinism defines the female sex as being the nurturers and that is the way it should be.i told briana that gay righhts is the same thing.i love my gay friends,hell,the man i am in love with likes men,but if anyone thinks that society can handle gay marriage,they have obviously not studied the way society reacts to change.i have no religious ties against marriage being consumated between a man and a woman, but if tomorrow gay people may marry, the public will retaliate against them. the conservative stronghold still has a tight grip and perhaps in 10 years,this will change,but not now.put into simple terms: the USA is not ready for such a drastic change.in my opinion, the best opinion is one that looks out for both parites and that is what i am doing. the more we assimilate,the better things get but in time.then she says that the only thing i have against me is that i am a female and that is why i speak so ignorantly.this is also false.yes,i may be female,this is true.she claims that she is a black female lesbian so she has more hardships.well,do you regret being any of these characteristics? if you do not,do not use it as an excuse.the minority title is an excuse for apathy.i know i am correct because i have black and gay friends that side with me.whatev.

california will never come gracefully.he has realized the human in my mistake and is repulsed by me. what i thought of as the perfect relationship,is now nothing more than a 4000 mile difference caught amidst lies,deception and betrayal.all of these things,i take the blame for. i am so weak of a person that i compromised unconditional love for temporary happiness.in other words,tim broke up with me.after the months of not speaking and me lying to him about rob, he said he didnt love me anymore and couldnt get over what i had done.billions of words scream from inside me,but only one surfaces:wonder.

i found this song by everytime i die called california,gracefully and it makes me think of you.i think of how i wish i could have went and slept every night in your arms and how in moments of lucidity and nights of loneliness, i love you and need you next to me.knowing my life will begin and end with you, makes me elated. everyone has that one person with whom they will spend the rest of their life with:whether that person is across the country or right down the street, the universe will come together and make them one.speaking of universes,i recently read that when two people make love,they form their own universe:as 2 bodies together and i thought, of you.i love you and that is not going to change.i hate the fact that i grow so discontent with our situations and end up mad at you, but i love how it will feel to have you here with me

calfornia,gracefully

two sets of taillights burn dim and divide,
stretch for miles making track marks across what veins fail to carry.
you should have taken my keys while my hands were shaking.
you could have kept the dead gone, entombed in the soil of arms.
raise the breathing abrasion with a turn of the key.
lost motor skills and a set cruise control.
mangled insect screams through the puddles of drool.
mainline the highway baby,
tie off the concrete veins and set the radio to fm
love songs clocked relapse defined by the rpm's of a static heart,
reanimated by the rush of eyes and horizon.
nothing warms like a road flare when caution sets.
anodyne seeps like dashed yellow lines through the withdrawn rearview addict.
drenched to the drawn teeth in seething foam.
if you want me dead, you should have called me home.
rumble strip as pulse prevents retreating eyes, dilate and close.
i can feel the dry heaves moisten, i can feel the blood withdraw.
you are my failed twelve step program.
a red light could kick this habit, a needle full of the junkies fuel.
drops of blood on her fingertips.
your arms are a deprivation chamber.
sterile to sixty in forever flat.
dissolve into the coast like john wayne.
a hero and his heroine.
